subject: College Athletics
Women
Lacrosse
lead_paragraph: Hilary Bowen scored five goals, and Katrina Dowd and Danielle Spencer had four apiece to lead Northwestern to its fifth straight N.C.A.A. championship against North Carolina.
snippet: Hilary Bowen scored five goals, and Katrina Dowd and Danielle Spencer had four apiece to lead Northwestern to its fifth straight N.C.A.A. championship against North Carolina.
